mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET O_IDX = O_IDX + 1 WHERE O_IDX > 0
UPDATE ORDERS SET O_IDX = O_IDX - 1 WHERE O_IDX > 0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORDERS WHERE O_M_NO = #{param1} ORDER BY O_NO DESC

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ORDERS WHERE O_M_NO = #{param1} AND O_NO IN (SELECT MAX(O_NO) FROM ORDERS GROUP BY O_IDX))A ORDER BY O_NO DESC)B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
SELECT O_DELIVERY FROM ORDERS WHERE O_M_NO = #{param1} AND O_NO IN (SELECT MAX(O_NO) FROM ORDERS GROUP BY O_IDX)
